# OneStep
仅需一步，轻松实现分布式异步任务。## Brokers- [x] MemoryBroker- [x] CronBroker- [x] WebHookBroker- [x] RabbitMQBroker- [ ] RedisBroker- [ ] KafkaBroker## example```pythonfrom onestep import step, WebHookBroker# 对外提供一个webhook接口，接收外部的消息@step(from_broker=WebHookBroker(path="/push"))def waiting_messages(message): print("收到消息：", message)if __name__ == '__main__': step.start(block=True)``````pythonfrom onestep import step, CronBroker# 每3秒触发一次任务@step(from_broker=CronBroker("* * * * * */3", a=1))def cron_task(message): assert message.body == {"a": 1} return messageif __name__ == '__main__': step.start(block=True)```更多例子请参阅：[examples](example)
